content.rendered:
Health Care & Sanitation

Contributing to various charitable causes that touch the underprivileged in the villages nearby by providing eggs and milk to the Orphanages, Anganwadis and Primary schools.

Collaborated with Government bodies/ Establishments / Gram panchayats and implemented COVID- 19 pandemic healthcare awareness campaigns, and distributed essential materials for protection like medical equipment’s, and supplies for the neighbouring communities
